name: Orangutan Rescue
description:
Shoot the poachers and save the orangutan! In this retro FPS,  defeat an never ending army of poachers protecting a stolen orangutan, and return it to it's family!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows to move.
  • Move mouse to look; can't look up or down.
  • Left click to shoot.
  • Collect the orangutan to win!

This game was made for an ISTEM project in 2021. It will receive a few updates throughout its lifetime.
